sage.terrain

Class ImageBasedHeightMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.terrain.AbstractHeightMap
      • sage.terrain.ImageBasedHeightMap

  • public class ImageBasedHeightMap
extends AbstractHeightMap
    ImageBasedHeightMap defines a height map which is created from the grayscale conversion of an image supplied to a constructor. The image used must have an equal height and width.
    Author:
    John Clevenger, based on a version from JMonkeyEngine by Mike Kienenberger.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class sage.terrain.AbstractHeightMap

        edgeSize, filter, heightData, heightScale

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageBasedHeightMap(java.awt.Image colorImage)
      Creates a HeightMap from an Image.
      ImageBasedHeightMap(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates a HeightMap from a file, which must contain an image in a valid recognized format.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean load()
      This method does nothing because the image data defining the ImageBasedHeightMap is loaded at construction time; the method is provided simply to satisfy the contract of the parent class AbstractHeightMap.

      • Methods inherited from class sage.terrain.AbstractHeightMap

        erodeTerrain, getHeightData, getHeightScale, getInterpolatedHeight, getScaledHeightAtPoint, getSize, getTrueHeightAtPoint, normalizeTerrain, setHeightAtPoint, setHeightScale, setMagnificationFilter, setSize, unloadHeightMap

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageBasedHeightMap

        public ImageBasedHeightMap(java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates a HeightMap from a file, which must contain an image in a valid recognized format.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the file containing the image from which the heightmap data should be extracted
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the specified file cannot be read

      • ImageBasedHeightMap

        public ImageBasedHeightMap(java.awt.Image colorImage)
        Creates a HeightMap from an Image. The image will be converted to grayscale, and the grayscale values will be used to generate the height map. White is highest point while black is lowest point. The current implementation requires that the Image be square (width == height).
        Parameters:
        colorImage - the image from which the heightmap data should be extracted.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public boolean load()
        This method does nothing because the image data defining the ImageBasedHeightMap is loaded at construction time; the method is provided simply to satisfy the contract of the parent class AbstractHeightMap. The method returns true.
        Specified by:
        load in class AbstractHeightMap
        Returns:
        true if the load was successful, false otherwise.
